name: Yoga Brunch at the Studio by C+C
description:
Join us for a peaceful, Saturday morning yoga session with Nishprah, followed by a yummy breakfast spread from C+C featuring Hello Tempayy 
 
Date: 31st August 2024, Saturday 
 
Reporting Time: 9.45 am 
 
Venue: the Studio by Copper + Cloves, Domlur 
 
*Be sure to bring a yoga mat for the session and a water bottle to stay hydrated!

location.name:
the Studio by Copper + Cloves
